subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text: {{Han char|rn=18|rad=刀|as=07|sn=9|four=42900|canj=KCLN,KDLN|ids=⿰⿱㐅术刂(G),⿰⿱㐅朮刂(HT)}} <!-- Splitting ids to make difference clearer. Alternative id: ⿰𣏂刂 -->

subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|[[䓭]], [[𠝨]], [[𤟆]]}} ''(Only for {{w|zh:國字標準字體|Taiwan character forms}} as mainland China {{w|zh:規範漢字|character forms}} contain {{l|mul|刹}} instead)''

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
Transcription of the ''kṣV'' ({{m|sa|क्ष|tr=-}}) sequence in various {{bor|zh|sa|-}} words, including:
* {{cog|sa|क्षेत्र||land; place of pilgrimage}} ({{zh-l|*剎多羅}})
* {{cog|sa|क्षण||instant}} ({{zh-l|*剎那}})
* {{cog|sa|क्षेम||residence}} ({{zh-l|*剎摩}})
* {{cog|sa|क्षत्रिय||warrior caste}} ({{zh-l|*剎怛利耶}}, {{zh-l|*剎帝利}}, {{zh-l|*剎利}})
